content: yarn bee snuggle up in white i single_crochet the fur just into the top layer of each ear the under side will be bald still step 9 re-thread any of the tails at out the end of the muzzle up to where you want them under the nostril pull apart all those tails so they re fluffier see pic above… take a minute to trim just a little so they re not in your way when sewing brush with wire dog brush you can do final trimming at the end step 10 stuff each foot and sew the open end shut 12 step 11 lay the body on a flat surface lightly stuff back thigh place the back thigh just behind the bulge in the back section of the body take the foot and just place it below the thigh to determine the placement of thigh sew on thigh along the side leaving bottom open view from above view from side step 12 sew on back foot attaching to the bottom of the thigh and onto the body be sure as you re sewing this you use the foot to close up the bottom of the thigh also be sure to stuff the thigh well as you re sewing it shut step 13 repeat this thigh and foot process for the remaining three legs the front thighs will be placed just behind the front bulge on the body go ahead and sew in all the ends now too except for the long tail left at the open end of the body you ll use that to attach the head step 14 with the body laying flat lay head next to it to determine where you want it to line up attach head sorry no picture it s pretty self-explanatory remember to stuff body well as you sew it shut you don t want the head to be floppy 13 step 15 using the same single_crochet technique used for the ears add fuzzy fur down the middle of the head and body start a few row above the eyes again this is the yarn bee snuggle up in white step 16 trim the mustache and any long ends from the fuzzy yarn that might be left on the ears and tail sew in any ends you might still have left step 17 check out the super cool creation you made snuggle it i couldn t resist posing with my first falkor i mean i *had* to feel free to post your creation online but please tag me if you do i want to see your cool creations items made from this pattern may be sold but please credit me if posting your creations online you may not use my images or copy this pattern as your own ©turtle and bird creations 2020
